member.name: MS_ADDINFO_CATALOGMEMBER
member.summary: The MS_ADDINFO_CATALOGMEMBER structure provides additional information for catalog member subject types.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_CATALOGMEMBER.cbStruct
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_CATALOGMEMBER.pStore
member.summary: A structure that contains a catalog file store.

member.name: MS_ADDINFO_CATALOGMEMBER.pMember
member.summary: A structure that contains a catalog member.
